text: I studied under the mathematics teacher a few years ago. She was  always very patient and understanding. She was great at breaking down complex formulas into simple concepts when explaining to her students how to solve complicated questions and always kept her lessons fun and enjoyable as well as affordable. I would recommend any student to study under her tutelage.

The mathematics teacher is a good teacher. Knows how to balance both fun and work! Good teaching methods! Help me to improve my mathematics from a barely passing to an A1! People here are very kind and welcoming!
Been here for 6 years! Been improving well!
The math teacher is very good her teaching skills are amazing. I have been under her for 10 years and my mathematical skills have improved tremendously over the years

She has helped me so much preparing for PSLE and I am very grateful for her .She put her blood,sweat and tears into teaching us and I will continue to learn with her.
Great smarts come great responsibility!
I have improved alot in my science and especially my mathematics with the new methods of doing mathematics. The teachers are relatively kind
